alert.note: Alert for City of Hyder (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 8:54AM AKST until December 25 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SIGNIFICANT SNOWFALL FOR PARTS OF SE AK THROUGH CHRISTMAS... The first frontal band is over the north gulf coast. A break between fronts over the north and central panhandle where very light snow is happening with little accumulation. To the south, the second frontal band is progressing northward across Prince of Wales. This band will reach the Juneau area in the late afternoon, while weakening. The rain snow line has already reached Ketchikan this morning. Snow totals so far have ranged from 2 inches to up to 13 inches. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Storm total snow accumulations of 20 to 25 inches. * WHERE...City of Hyder. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snowfall rates expected Saturday mid morning. A period of light freezing rain is possible late Saturday night into early Sunday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
